lt.vtvpmc.java.voting

Interface VoteRegistry


  • public interface VoteRegistry
    Vote registry registers votes while the election is running.
    Author:
    ggrazevicius

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAWinner()
      Return a current leader in the voting process.
      int getNumberOfVotesCast()
      Returns number of valid votes cast.
      boolean registerVote(Vote vote)
      Register a vote.
      void stopVotingProcess()
      Stops voting process.

    • Method Detail

      • registerVote

        boolean registerVote(Vote vote)
        Register a vote. Only one vote per voter is allowed. The first vote is to be accepted. Will not allow registering a vote if voting is stopped.
        Parameters:
        vote - a vote cast for a candidate
        Returns:
        true if vote was registered, false otherwise

      • getAWinner

        String getAWinner()
        Return a current leader in the voting process. If there are no votes cast, or it is not possible to determine a candidate because there is more than one candidate that received highest number of votes should throw an IllegalStateException.
        Returns:
        current winner of the vite

      • getNumberOfVotesCast

        int getNumberOfVotesCast()
        Returns number of valid votes cast.
        Returns:
        number of votes cast

      • stopVotingProcess

        void stopVotingProcess()
        Stops voting process. When voting is stopped, votes are no longer accepted.
